channel.title: Minnesota Cryptocurrency - Blockchain Education, Bitcoin Events, Privacy Meetups on Minnesota Cryptocurrency
channel.description: Recent content in Minnesota Cryptocurrency - Blockchain Education, Bitcoin Events, Privacy Meetups on Minnesota Cryptocurrency

item.title: NANO
item.description: Time: 04:00 PM on Friday, March 8, 2019 Location: Bruininks 420B Come join Minnesota Cryptocurrency and the creator of the cryptocurrency, Nano, to learn about a new technology that is rapidly influencing the blockchain space!

item.title: Special Guest: Daniel Ternyak
item.description: Time: 04:00 PM on Friday, March 29, 2019 Location: Bruininks 420B Well, welcome back! hope everyone enjoyed their Spring break, We’re coming right back with a special meeting this Friday. We’ll be hosting Daniel Ternyak, previously the CTO of MyCrypto/MyEtherWallet, and now the  founder of Grant.io. He’ll be discussing he time as CTO as well as talking about his new venture Grant.io.

item.title: Stratis
item.description: Time: 04:00 PM on Friday, April 5, 2019 Location: Bruininks 420B This Friday, we will be hosting Stratis Platform’s CEO & Founder, Chris Trews via video call. He will be giving us a basic overview of what Stratis is and how BaaS (Blockchain as a Service) allows for a company to come along and utilize their blockchain technology without a huge learning curve involved. Chris will present for roughly 20 minutes and then we will open the floor for questions.

item.description: div.OutlookMessageHeader, table.moz-email-headers-table, blockquote #_t, #MailContainerBody #_t {background-image:url(“https://click.mlsend.com/link/f/cnM9MTExMDQ4NzQwNzkxODA2MTIyMSZjb2RlPW43eTImcj0xNDEyNzk0Ng==.s2mx6DbaWe1Ix2haVqwgzUzRniqL2NZU1VVs8TlZcjo")} Weekly Newsletter Event for the Week There will be no meeting this Friday or the next due to most of us leaving for Spring break.

item.title: Get RICH Trading Cryptocurrency
item.description: Time: 04:00 PM on Friday, February 22, 2019 Location: Bruininks 420B This Friday, we’ll be continuing last week’s topic and venture more into trading analysis. We’ll be joined by a seasoned trader who will share his knowledge and tactics in the crypto market. Be sure to stop by to learn and engage with us!

item.title: Intro to Cryptocurrency Analytics 💰💰💰
item.description: div.OutlookMessageHeader, table.moz-email-headers-table, blockquote #_t, #MailContainerBody #_t {background-image:url(“https://click.mlsend.com/link/f/cnM9MTA5OTY1OTAyMTc0MjI0OTMzOSZjb2RlPXIwZDUmcj0xMzk1NDQ4OA==.S9RPIbrMUGp9vODBDuwAfTb6maDaoX1JRtpbWeUpCcg")} Weekly Newsletter Event for the Week This Friday, we’ll continue the financial focus and look at crypto-asset data tracking websites such as CoinMetrics and Messari.

item.title: Crypto + Hedge Funds!
item.description: Time: 04:00 PM on Friday, February 15, 2019 Location: Bruininks 420B Join Minnesota Cryptocurrency and “Global Reserve Capital”, a hedge fund focused in crypto-assets, to explore the crossroads between blockchain and trading.

item.title: Cryptocurrency and Hedge Funds 💰
item.description: div.OutlookMessageHeader, table.moz-email-headers-table, blockquote #_t, #MailContainerBody #_t {background-image:url(“https://click.mlsend.com/link/f/cnM9MTA4OTUwMjYzOTA1OTYzNzMwNSZjb2RlPWY0ejcmcj0xMzc5NTg1OA==.5XXh1cSLBom1IFG7Ss0FjkBfe2m6ZFQ9OdeWTuHfyjI")} Weekly Newsletter Event for the Week This Friday, Doug of Global Reserve Capital will be taking over the discussion.

item.title: Consensus Algorithms
item.description: Time: 04:00 PM on Friday, February 8, 2019 Location: Bruininks Hall 123 Have you ever heard of consensus algorithms? If not, you should come learn about them at our meeting THIS Friday. Join Minnesota Cryptocurrency and dive deep into the world of consensus algorithms: the backbone of blockchain.

item.title: Consensus Algorithms: How Blockchains Work Discussion
item.description: div.OutlookMessageHeader, table.moz-email-headers-table, blockquote #_t, #MailContainerBody #_t {background-image:url(“https://click.mlsend.com/link/f/cnM9MTA4NDQzMDcwNzQ5MDU1OTU3MCZjb2RlPWc4cDYmcj0xMzcxOTE3Mg==.RU2o4_XClFG47D7iRFMN3VT6sGNR4JA1a1pXUaYtJIc")} Weekly Newsletter Event for the Week This Friday, we’ll be discussing consensus algorithms, their pros and cons, and their implications for the blockchain industry as a whole.

item.title: Kickoff Meeting
item.description: Time: 04:00 PM on Friday, January 25, 2019 Location: Bruininks 420B Come join Minnesota Cryptocurrency for our first meeting of the semester! We will be broadly covering the basics of cryptocurrency and snacks will be provided. Hope to see you there!

item.title: Learn How to Secure Your Cryptocurrency 🔐
item.description: div.OutlookMessageHeader, table.moz-email-headers-table, blockquote #_t, #MailContainerBody #_t {background-image:url(“https://click.mlsend.com/link/f/cnM9MTA4MDA5OTY3MDY5ODQ5NzczMyZjb2RlPXowbDgmcj0xMzY1MzI1OA==.W12AWdejp0kPA_5LA6OI69JbgFKimgVG_gYTv2z53Yc")} Weekly Newsletter Event for the Week This Friday, we’ll be holding an interactive “Secure Your Cryptocurrency” discussion.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Chill + Giveaways
Come hang with us! + Crypto giveaway! 💰💰

Minnesota Cryptocurrency Events and News We made it through another semester! What better way to close out a semester than to chill out before finals.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Trading
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, November 30, 2018 Location: Bruininks 432 For this week’s event, we thought it would be a good idea to discuss trading. We’ll dive into technical analysis, trading techniques, and outlook on the recent bearishness in the market. It would also be a good opportunity to share ideas and interesting projects other members have invested in.

item.title: Trading Crypto 💰💰💰
item.description: div.OutlookMessageHeader, table.moz-email-headers-table, blockquote #_t, #MailContainerBody #_t {background-image:url(“https://click.mlsend.com/link/f/cnM9MTAzNDQwODE1MTE4MjQ4MDc1MiZjb2RlPWoxeTMmcj0xMjk5NDIwNg==.0TCHHxH_s4olOxzgiWZ4zb_57de7Y4NbqbGJqcI7sGM")} Can’t see images? Minnesota Cryptocurrency Events and News Hope everyone enjoyed their Thanksgiving and shared our (un)helpful talking points at the dinner table! For this week’s event, we thought it would be a good idea to discuss trading.

item.title: Special Edition: (Un)helpful Cryptocurrency Cheat Sheet
item.description: div.OutlookMessageHeader, table.moz-email-headers-table, blockquote #_t, #MailContainerBody #_t {background-image:url(“https://click.mlsend.com/link/f/cnM9MTAyOTczMzcyNTQwNDkyNzA1NCZjb2RlPXk2ZTMmcj0xMjkxNTQzMA==.W7Uc-AxF5NiVaJORHIS-ZuJW6-OjefVV8Sh0_x1ddE8")} Crush Conversations with these (Un)helpful Talking Points! We are off for this week, so in the meantime, we came up with a list of common cryptocurrency questions family members and friends have.

item.title: Make Your Own Cryptocurrency Coding Session
item.description:
Time: 07:00 PM on Wednesday, November 14, 2018 Location: Bruininks Hall 123 Join us this Wednesday as we explore integrating transactions with our blockchain. We will be discussing inputs and outputs, transaction fees, miner’s rewards, and so much more! We have streamlined the development process to focus more on high-level topics, so make sure to attend even if you aren’t an expert coder!
When?Wednesday, November 14th at 7:00 PM

item.title: Battle for Privacy
item.description:
Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, November 16, 2018 Location: Bruininks 432 Privacy coins like Monero and Zcash feature cutting-edge applied cryptography. Privacy, fungibility, and security are important characteristics of money. Join us this Friday to learn more about these privacy coins and how they’re changing the game. We will also discuss the difficulty of developing privacy-focused systems and the best ways for assessing the quality of privacy technologies.
When? Friday, November 16th at 4:30 PM

item.title: Coin of the Week: EOS + Coding Session Today!
item.description: div.OutlookMessageHeader, table.moz-email-headers-table, blockquote #_t, #MailContainerBody #_t {background-image:url(“https://click.mlsend.com/link/f/cnM9MTAyNDczMjMzMjEzMDU3MTgzOSZjb2RlPXIxdzgmcj0xMjgzNDc2OA==.8nQoPVx-L_w_na0_wsDDkGIvcILSIQRm5bPEurTYF60")} Minnesota Cryptocurrency Presents: EOS This week we’ll be discussing EOS, the decentralized operating system! Similar to Ethereum, EOS serves as a blockchain architecture for decentralized applications, or dApps.

item.title: Battle for Privacy 🔒
item.description: div.OutlookMessageHeader, table.moz-email-headers-table, blockquote #_t, #MailContainerBody #_t {background-image:url(“https://click.mlsend.com/link/f/cnM9MTAyMzU3NzE4MzQyOTMzNDc3MyZjb2RlPWw2ZjYmcj0xMjgxMDc0Mg==.qNGHH2SjkMd1d9FGyMrojoFzjkx6Kvmn7MBEc989g5Q")} Minnesota Cryptocurrency Events and News Privacy coins like Monero and Zcash feature cutting-edge applied cryptography. Privacy, fungibility, and security are important characteristics of money. Join us this Friday to learn more about these privacy coins and how they’re changing the game.

item.title: Kickoff Event - What is Bitcoin?
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, September 7, 2018 Location: Bruininks Hall 144 Do you have an interest in blockchain, cryptocurrency, and Bitcoin and want to learn more and get more involved? Here’s the perfect place to start! We will go over the basics (no prior knowledge needed) in an interactive session.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Trading Talk
Notable Altcoins Meeting
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, September 14, 2018 Location: Robert Bruininks Hall 432 Come join Crypto@UMN this Friday at 4:30p in Bruininks 432 to discuss various altcoins and their role within the cryptocurrency community!

item.title: Cryptocurrency Deep Dive - Privacy
The Future of Blockchain
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, September 21, 2018 Location: Robert Bruininks Hall 432 Blockchain has limitless potential for applications outside of cryptocurrency, join us to discuss the possibilities!

item.title: Cryptocurrency Trading Talk
Mining Workshop
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, September 28, 2018 Location: Robert Bruininks Hall 432 Join us this Friday in Bruininks Hall 432 at 4:30p to learn the basics of mining cryptocurrency.

item.title: Ethereum Solidity Coding Session
item.description: Time: 07:00 PM on Wednesday, October 3, 2018 Location: Bruininks Hall 123 Learn Ethereum and Solidity! You can use the programming language Solidity to create smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. Some previous experience with object-oriented programming is preferred but not required.

item.title: Secure Your Cryptocurrency
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, October 5, 2018 Location: Bruininks 432 Theft of cryptocurrency may be more common than you think. Join us this Friday at 4:30p in Bruininks 432 to discuss how to safely protect your investment.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Trading Talk and News
Bitcoin Forks
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, October 12, 2018 Location: Bruininks 432 Come to our meeting THIS Friday at 4:30p in Bruininks 432 to learn more about current and future Bitcoin forks!

item.title: Create Your Own Cryptocurrency!
item.description: Time: 07:00 PM on Wednesday, October 17, 2018 Location: Bruininks Hall 123 Create your own cryptocurrency today at our deep dive meeting! We will get into many mechanics if time permits, from start to the process of implementing mining! Find us at 7 PM in Bruininks Hall 123!

item.title: Kyle Samera on Entrepreneurship in Crypto
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, October 19, 2018 Location: Bruininks 432 Come join us this Friday to hear Kyle Samera discuss his experience starting the cryptocurrency newsletter Unbankd. FREE FOOD will be provided!

item.title: Supply Chain and Cryptocurrency
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, October 26, 2018 Location: Bruininks 432 Today’s supply chains are complex and lacking transparency due to lack of inconsistent or unavailable data. Join us this Friday to learn and discuss how blockchains could counter these inefficiencies and add new value; or maybe how traditional databases are still the way to go ¯_(ツ)_/¯

item.title: Crypto Scams
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, November 2, 2018 Location: Bruininks Hall 432 FREE CANE’S! Also, the growth of the blockchain and cryptocurrency ecosystem has been exciting. innovations have attracted quit a big crowd over the year, but this also includes a number of bad actors. Join us this Friday to discuss and learn about the scams that have happened in the past and how to avoid the current ones today. This space is a lot more enjoyable if you know how to navigate it!

item.title: Decentralized Storage
item.description: Time: 07:00 PM on Wednesday, November 7, 2018 Location: Bruininks Hall 123 Join us TODAY to take a deep dive into distributed storage methods. We will discuss the pros and cons (mostly cons) of storing information on distributed systems, and we will cover some workarounds and other solutions to facilitate the integration of information with these distributed systems. Previous blockchain knowledge suggested but not required. When? Today at 7:00 PM

item.title: Decentralized Exchanges
item.description: Time: 04:30 PM on Friday, November 9, 2018 Location: Bruininks 432 FREE FOOD! Join us this Friday to discuss decentralized exchanges. Normal exchanges provide a single point of failure, which has resulted in numerous hacks and general uncertainty. Decentralized exchanges on the other hand offer a solution as they allow users to retain control of their funds throughout the trading process. We will discuss their advantages, disadvantages, and the status of current projects.

item.title: Decentralized Exchanges + We're moving to Discord!
item.description: div.OutlookMessageHeader, table.moz-email-headers-table, blockquote #_t, #MailContainerBody #_t {background-image:url(“https://click.mlsend.com/link/f/cnM9MTAyMjU3MzEwMjc0NTI2MTE1NiZjb2RlPWQwbDQmcj0xMjc5NTQ1MA==.4C7bftBRnOO7d0hB6BHr90ZiBkVNy1KlVnYdYMX3XQs")} Minnesota Cryptocurrency Events and News Join us this Friday to discuss decentralized exchanges. Normal exchanges provide a single point of failure, which has resulted in numerous hacks and general uncertainty. Decentralized exchanges on the other hand offer a solution as they allow users to retain control of their funds throughout the trading process.
